title: Production-Ready Code
description: All code must be production-ready before being merged.
rules: Code must pass all existing tests
Code must include comprehensive test coverage for new functionality
Code must follow established coding standards and patterns
Code must handle edge cases and error conditions gracefully
examples: Adding comprehensive unit tests for new functionality
Writing clear JSDoc comments for all public methods
Implementing proper error handling with graceful degradation
Following established design patterns for consistency
exceptions: Hotfixes for critical production issues (with mandatory post-fix cleanup)
Experimental features clearly marked as such
